review: Hard to believe that people actually do this to their kids. Fascinating account of what a mother will do to keep a daughter at home with her and have people feel sorry for. Excellent movie never a dull moment.

A heart breaking story that shows what happens when one's mind is fractured or severely damaged by mental illness. The acting by all is superb. You feel the pain of the child and the mental illness of the mother profoundly.
excellen movie. the mother was something else.I felt so sorry for that poor girl.
Havent seen the movie yet. Busy following The Act Series on DSTV based upon the same story. Sickening story to say the least.
